group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashRed2][surround:3026A07][chara:770100:effect_shake][chara:770101:effect_shake][bgEffect:shakeLarge]Gghh...!

group_1.textRight: Are you all right?!

group_1.textLeft: Y-yeah...!

group_1.textRight: So, how do you want to settle this?

group_1.textCenter: Since you guys dared to hurt our lovely Ayame...
You must be prepared for the consequences,@yes?

group_1.textLeft: Damn...not again...!

group_1.textCenter: We were going to eliminate them one by one,@but now...

group_1.textLeft: ...It's time to retreat!

group_1.textRight: Right...!
I'm glad we made it in time...
...Ayame, do you remember what you@promised me before?
"That you'll always consult with me before@jumping into danger"...

group_1.textLeft: Yup...

group_1.textRight: Please...keep your promise...!

group_1.textLeft: Now, let's go home.

group_1.textRight: Wait a sec, Konoha.
Ayame, Kako and Felicia are still nearby,@aren't they?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, right...! Kako might be hurt...

group_1.textRight: Then, let's send them home for the day, too.

group_1.textLeft: But, our safety comes first...

group_1.textRight: There's a chance that those Promised Blood@girls are still lurking around.
Ayame, I'm sure you're worried about them too,@right?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... I just ran off on my own...

group_1.textCenter: ...[wait:0.8][chara:302600:cheek_0][chara:302600:motion_300][chara:302600:lipSynch_1]Well, they are your friends, I suppose...

group_1.textRight: Thanks, Konoha.
Phew... We're finally home.
What do you wanna eat for dinner?
Ayame...?

group_1.textLeft: Um, umm... I wanted to ask you two somethin'...

group_1.textRight: What is it?

group_1.textLeft: Before...
You promised you wouldn't deny my feelings,@right...?
From now on...if Kako or anybody else@is in trouble...
I can help them, can't I...?

group_1.textRight: As long as you discuss it with me before@jumping into danger, you may.

group_1.textLeft: But, what if I wanna help right away, like today?

group_1.textRight: You can't simply send a message like,@"someone's picking a fight with us!"
I won't be able to determine how dangerous it is.
...If you continue to do things like what@happened today...
I may have to reconsider our promise...

group_1.textLeft: No waaaay...!

group_1.textCenter: (Whether our priority should be the three of us,@or somebody else's life...)

group_1.textRight: ...Hey, Konoha.
If it's an emergency...
Isn't it crazy to ask for permission before@helping someone?

group_1.textLeft: Hazuki...!
Then what should be done?

group_1.textRight: Let's all think about that together.
We have a fundamental problem to address,@too...

group_1.textLeft: What do you mean...?

group_1.textRight: Up to now, our survival has been our top priority,@no matter what.
That's why we didn't join any groups and@remained neutral, right?
In fact, it was convenient for us.
But even if we claim to be unrelated to others,@there's still people who'll attack us.
If Ayame helps a Union girl, they'll think she's@with the Union too.
In short... We can't remain neutral anymore.

group_1.textLeft: I...can't help Kako or Felicia...?

group_1.textRight: We don't want to compromise our safety,@even when Ayame helps her friends.
That's why I want to talk about what our@priorities are and how we should act.

group_1.textLeft: ...Hazuki, are you unhappy with our@current situation...?

group_1.textRight: At least, I don't think it's working out for us,@and I'd like to change that.

group_1.textLeft: I don't know how I'm supposeta act, though...

group_1.textRight: Well, Ayame, what do you want to do@in the future?

group_1.textLeft: ...Oh, I've been thinkin' about that lately!

group_1.textRight: Really?

group_1.textLeft: Lemme see... [chara:302801:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:302801:cheek_0][chara:302801:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json:motion_100][chara:302801:lipSynch_1]Oh, here! This book!

group_1.textRight: "Career Studies for Middle and@High School Students"...?

group_1.textLeft: I read it 'cuz Kako recommended it to me!@It's hard to read 'cuz it's full of big words, but...
It's really interestin' to see how many different@jobs there are!

group_1.textRight: Didn't you say you were going to return@that book to Kako...?

group_1.textLeft: I ran into those guys before I could,@and then forgot about it...

group_1.textRight: Hmm... It's good to know about your future,@but what do you want to be as a Magical Girl?

group_1.textLeft: That's easy! I wanna be stronger!
So I can help you and Konoha!
And Kako, and Felicia...

group_1.textRight: Konoha, what about you?

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry, but...I can't give you an answer@right now...

group_1.textRight: ...I see. Then let's talk about it some other time.
